interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/09/20 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '한국어', '日本語', 'العربية', 'Português', 'Nederlands', 'Deutsch', 'Русский', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Indonesia', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Türkçe', '中文（台灣）', '中文（中国）', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'हिन्दी', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Русский', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Cam Lizotte', 'Nico Rijgersberg', 'Jay Silver', 'Joshua Young', 'Gilly Fogg'], 'Producers': ['Kristen Newlands', 'Phillip Stamp', 'Dr. Alice Wilder', 'Steven Denure', 'Shevaun Gray', 'Anne Loi', 'Margaret Harrison', 'Wendy Harris', 'Samantha Freeman'], 'Starring': ['DevanCohen', 'Ava Close', 'Elizabeth Hanna'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: I do think it's a cute show and I like that it's clean and sweet. My 7 year old loves it!

But the singing reeeeeaallly gets to me. I wondered if I was the only one but I see from other season/episode reviews that I'm not🤔

Other than that, it's worthy of 5 stars, in my opinion🙄 Review Title: Sorry but the singing makes me want to rate it much lower Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Kris Greengrove', 'Susan Holden', 'Steve Oakes', 'David Starr', 'Richard Winkler', 'Soo Kim', 'Jennifer Twomey', 'Marcy Pritchard', 'Amy Steinberg', 'Max Goodman'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Such a cute show, my 4 old loves it! I've noticed she developed an interest in math and patterns after starting this show...love that! Fun and catchy songs! I'm sorry, I'm not a person that knows all the tech details but from my perspective it's

My 7 year old loves it!

But the singing reeeeeaallly gets to me. I wondered if I was the only one but I see from other season/episode reviews that I'm not🤔

profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for engaging and educational content aimed at young children, particularly enjoying shows that integrate music and learning aspects, especially in math and patterns. Their child's growing interest in math underscores the user’s focus on educational value, alongside a consistent appreciation for family-friendly programming with fun, catchy songs that entertain young audiences. Their previous high ratings of 4.7 and 5.0 reflect a favorable reception of quality programming in this genre.

Recently, the user has expressed a nuanced perspective on children's shows, evidenced by a mixed review of a particular title. While they find the show cute, clean, and appealing to their 7-year-old, they also voiced a specific concern about the overwhelming singing, which detracted from their overall enjoyment, leading them to assign a rating of 4.0 instead of 5.0. This suggests an evolving critical engagement with content, reflecting their high standards for quality.

Alongside their interest in children's programming, the user has also expanded their viewing habits to include adult-oriented content, seeking titles that boast exceptional picture quality and intellectual depth. This openness to diverse content indicates a desire for entertainment that not only captivates but also fosters family discussions. Overall, the user values a blend of entertaining, educational, and high-quality programming for both parents and children.
